channel.title: [Warning] - Fraudulent User Acting As Developer
channel.description:
Please take note i had posted this on my website and pasted it here. He has also claimed he has hacked Trisidia's MoparScape account, whether this is true or not i don't know.
Over the past 24 hours you may of noticed the user "High Detail" has been demoted to a banned user, reason being his fraudulent actions towards to community is making the website look very unprofessional. Please be careful of anyone named "Mike Hurst". Hes been claiming to be a guy called "Trisidia" who developed a server and seems to be well known due to the money this guy made from his account. Heres some conversations the user has had with myself. [IMG]http://ihaxx.net/d0x/scammer1.png[/img] [IMG]http://ihaxx.net/d0x/scammer2.png[/img] [IMG]http://ihaxx.net/d0x/scammer3.png[/img] Not only has he done this, but hes also tried to chargeback numerous subscriptions he has previously had to Top-List forums, which i doubt he will succeed at regaining as PayPal never refund for virtual items. Heres some information on the user so you don't get yourself mugged off by him. [code] Name: Mark Hurst Address: 11 Selbourne Avenue Dewsbury West Yorkshire GB WF12 9PA Phone Numbers: (+44) 7511257893 Skypes: trisidiax mark.hurst33 Emails: 51ali@live.co.uk Domains: www.phoenixrsps.com[/code] Kind Regards, Diesel

Read full topic

item.title: [Warning] - Fraudulent User Acting As Developer
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[quote=“Elux, post:5, topic:478966”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=597182.msg4205070#msg4205070 date=1358811408]
no need to be rude, he’s just trying to warn us man.

@op: thanks. you can’t trust anyone nowadays.
[/quote]

I’ve been here since 2006, just helping out other members to prevent them being scammed.[/quote]
Your profile says 2007

Read full topic
